menstrual.title: Menstrual phase
menstrual.description: The first day of your period marks the beginning of your menstrual cycle.

follicular.title: Follicular phase
follicular.description: This phase starts on the first day of your period and lasts until ovulation.

ovulation.title: Ovulation
ovulation.description: This is when an egg is released from your ovary.

luteal.title: Luteal phase
luteal.description: This phase begins after ovulation and ends when your next period starts.

latePeriod.title: Late period
latePeriod.description: A late period can be caused by stress, changes in weight, or hormonal changes. If your period is more than a week late, consider taking a pregnancy test or consulting your healthcare provider.

prediction.title: How predictions work
prediction.description: Lunari predicts your next period based on your cycle history. The more data you log, the more accurate the predictions become.
